title: About
text1: Listing a carbon sequestration project with a major registry can cost hundreds of thousands of dollars, making it cost-effective for only the largest of projects. This situation deprives smaller players of the economic benefits that come from participating in voluntary carbon markets.
text2: Leveraging a technology stack that includes satellite remote-sensing, machine learning, and blockchain, Lynxâ€™s solution removes the expensive manual steps, automatically generating carbon credits directly into an online marketplace. Unlike other blockchain-based carbon platforms, each tonne is uniquely tracked, fully traceable to the original source.
